mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cp_crdtbl WHERE CB_IDNO = #{cbIdno} and CB_PLASTIC_CD = 'U'
SELECT COUNT(CB_CARDHOLDER_NO) FROM CP_CRDTBL WHERE CB_PLASTIC_CD ='P';
